content:
# A PhD on a space-related topic successfully defended! - Dr. Eng. Dagmara Stasiowska-- Space Technology Centre 

URL: https://ctk.agh.edu.pl/en/news/detail/a-phd-on-a-space-related-topic-successfully-defended-dr-eng-dagmara-stasiowska
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:25:09

A PhD on a space-related topic successfully defended! - Dr. Eng. Dagmara Stasiowska 

 06-03-2025 

 PhD defended! Dagmara Stasiowska joins the ranks of PhD engineers at the Space Technology Centre AGH! 

We are proud to announce that on 
March 3, 2025
, 
M.Sc. Eng. Dagmara Stasiowska
 successfully defended her PhD thesis titled 
“The assessment of the usefulness of the biocybernetic model of a bee colony to predict the effects of giving the queen bee stress associated with space flight”
.

The thesis was supervised by 
Prof. Dr. hab. Eng. Ryszard Tadeusiewicz
, with 
Dr. Michał Kolasa
 serving as the assistant supervisor.

Congratulations! This is a tremendous achievement and another step forward in the research on the impact of space conditions on living organisms.

Although she has just defended her PhD, this is not the end of her accomplishments. 
Dr. Eng. Dagmara Stasiowska
 is also involved in the 
MXene in LEO
 experiment, part of 
IGNIS
 – Poland’s first technological and scientific mission to the International Space Station.

The 
IGNIS
 mission, scheduled for the spring of 2025, marks a groundbreaking moment for Polish science and space technology. As part of the 
MXene in LEO
 experiment, innovative materials will be studied for their potential applications in the extreme conditions of space.

Once again, congratulations to 
Dr. Eng. Dagmara Stasiowska
, and we wish her continued success!

Back
